45  public function showModel($model, $id = null) {
46  $model = str_replace ( ".", "\\", $model );
47  $adminRoute = $this->_getFiles ()->getAdminBaseRoute ();
48  $this->_showModel ( $model, $id );
49  $metas = OrmUtils::getModelMetadata ( $model );
50  $metas_ = [ ];
51  foreach ( $metas as $k => $meta ) {
52  $metas_ [ltrim ( $k, '#' )] = $meta;
53  }
54  $this->_getAdminViewer ()->getModelsStructureDataTable ( $metas_ );
55  $this->_getAdminViewer ()->getModelsStructureDataTable ( ValidatorsManager::getCacheInfo ( $model ), "dtValidation" );
56  $bt = $this->jquery->semantic ()->htmlButton ( "btYuml", "Class diagram" );
57  $bt->postOnClick ( $adminRoute . "/_showDiagram/", "{model:'" . \str_replace ( "\\", "|", $model ) . "'}", "#modal", [ "attr" => "" ] );
58  $bt = $this->jquery->semantic ()->htmlButton ( "btValidation", "Validate instances" );
59  $bt->addIcon ( "check", true, true );
60  $bt->postOnClick ( $adminRoute . "/validateInstances/", "{model:'" . \str_replace ( "\\", "|", $model ) . "'}", "#validationResults", [ "attr" => "","hasLoader" => "internal" ] );
61  $this->jquery->exec ( '$("#models-tab .item").tab();', true );
62  $this->jquery->getOnClick ( "#btAddNew", $adminRoute . "/newModel/" . $this->formModal, "#frm-add-update", [ "hasLoader" => "internal" ] );
63  $this->jquery->compile ( $this->view );
64  $this->loadView ( $this->_getFiles ()->getViewShowTable (), [ "classname" => $model ] );
65  }
66 
67  public function validateInstances() {
68  $model = $_POST ['model'];
69  $model = str_replace ( "|", "\\", $model );
70  if (class_exists ( $model )) {
71  ValidatorsManager::start ();
72  $result = [ ];
73  $instances = DAO::getAll ( $model, '', false );
74  foreach ( $instances as $instance ) {
75  $violations = ValidatorsManager::validate ( $instance );
76  if (sizeof ( $violations ) > 0) {
77  $result [] = [ $instance,$violations ];
78  }
79  }
80  $this->_getAdminViewer ()->displayViolations ( $result );
81  } else {
82  echo $this->showSimpleMessage ( "{$model} class does not exists!", "Instances validation", "error", 'error' );
83  }
84  }
85 
86  public function refreshTable($id = null) {
87  $model = $_SESSION ["model"];
88  $compo = $this->_showModel ( $model, $id );
89  $this->jquery->execAtLast ( '$("#table-details").html("");' );
90  $this->jquery->renderView ( "@framework/Admin/main/component.html", [ "compo" => $compo ] );
91  }
92 
93  public function showModelClick($modelAndId) {
94  $array = \explode ( "||", $modelAndId );
95  if (\is_array ( $array )) {
96  $table = $array [0];
97  $id = $array [1];
98  $this->jquery->exec ( "$('#menuDbs .active').removeClass('active');$('.ui.label.left.pointing.teal').removeClass('left pointing teal active');$(\"[data-model='" . $table . "']\").addClass('active');$(\"[data-model='" . $table . "']\").find('.ui.label').addClass('left pointing teal');", true );
99  $this->showModel ( $table, $id );
100  $this->jquery->execAtLast ( "$(\"tr[data-ajax='" . $id . "']\").click();" );
101  echo $this->jquery->compile ();
102  }
103  }
104 
105  protected function _showModel($model, $id = null) {
106  $_SESSION ["model"] = $model;
107  $totalCount = 0;
108  $datas = $this->getInstances ( $model, $totalCount, 1, $id );
109  $this->formModal = ($this->_getModelViewer ()->isModal ( $datas, $model )) ? "modal" : "no";
110  return $this->_getModelViewer ()->getModelDataTable ( $datas, $model, $totalCount, $this->activePage );
111  }
112 
113  protected function getInstances($model, &$totalCount, $page = 1, $id = null) {
114  $this->activePage = $page;
115  $adminDatas = $this->_getAdminData ();
116  $totalCount = DAO::count ( $model, $adminDatas->_getInstancesFilter ( $model ) );
117  $recordsPerPage = $this->_getModelViewer ()->recordsPerPage ( $model, $totalCount );
118  if (is_numeric ( $recordsPerPage )) {
119  if (isset ( $id )) {
120  $rownum = DAO::getRownum ( $model, $id );
121  $this->activePage = Pagination::getPageOfRow ( $rownum, $recordsPerPage );
122  }
123  return DAO::paginate ( $model, $this->activePage, $recordsPerPage, $adminDatas->_getInstancesFilter ( $model ), false );
124  }
125  return DAO::getAll ( $model, "", false );
126  }
127 
128  protected function search($model, $search) {
129  $fields = $this->_getAdminData ()->getSearchFieldNames ( $model );
130  return CRUDHelper::search ( $model, $search, $fields );
131  }
132 
133  public function refresh_() {
134  $model = $_POST ["_model"];
135  if (isset ( $_POST ["s"] )) {
136  $instances = $this->search ( $model, $_POST ["s"] );
137  } else {
138  $instances = $this->getInstances ( $model, $totalCount, URequest::post ( "p", 1 ) );
139  }
140  if (! isset ( $totalCount )) {
141  $totalCount = DAO::count ( $model, $this->_getAdminData ()->_getInstancesFilter ( $model ) );
142  }
143  $recordsPerPage = $this->_getModelViewer ()->recordsPerPage ( $model, $totalCount );
144  if (isset ( $recordsPerPage )) {
145  UResponse::asJSON ();
146  $responseFormatter = new ResponseFormatter ();
147  print_r ( $responseFormatter->getJSONDatas ( $instances ) );
148  } else {
149  $this->formModal = ($this->_getModelViewer ()->isModal ( $instances, $model )) ? "modal" : "no";
150  $compo = $this->_getModelViewer ()->getModelDataTable ( $instances, $model, $totalCount )->refresh ( [ "tbody" ] );
151  $this->jquery->execAtLast ( '$("#search-query-content").html("' . $_POST ["s"] . '");$("#search-query").show();$("#table-details").html("");' );
152  $this->jquery->renderView ( "@framework/Admin/main/component.html", [ "compo" => $compo ] );
153  }
154  }
155 
156  protected function _edit($instance, $modal = "no") {
157  $_SESSION ["instance"] = $instance;
158  $modal = ($modal == "modal");
159  $formName = "frmEdit-" . UString::cleanAttribute ( get_class ( $instance ) );
160  $form = $this->_getModelViewer ()->getForm ( $formName, $instance );
161  $this->jquery->click ( "#action-modal-" . $formName . "-0", "$('#" . $formName . "').form('submit');", false );
162  if (! $modal) {
163  $this->jquery->click ( "#bt-cancel", "$('#form-container').transition('drop');" );
164  $this->jquery->compile ( $this->view );
165  $this->loadView ( $this->_getFiles ()->getViewEditTable (), [ "modal" => $modal,"frmEditName" => $formName ] );
166  } else {
167  $this->jquery->exec ( "$('#modal-" . $formName . "').modal('show');", true );
168  $form = $form->asModal ( \get_class ( $instance ) );
169  $form->setActions ( [ "Okay_","Cancel" ] );
170  $btOkay = $form->getAction ( 0 );
171  $btOkay->addClass ( "green" )->setValue ( "Validate modifications" );
172  $form->onHidden ( "$('#modal-" . $formName . "').remove();" );
173  echo $form->compile ( $this->jquery, $this->view );
174  echo $this->jquery->compile ( $this->view );
175  }
176  }
177 
178  public function edit($modal = "no", $ids = "") {
179  $instance = $this->getModelInstance ( $ids ,false);
180  $instance->_new = false;
181  $this->_edit ( $instance, $modal );
182  }

184  public function newModel($modal = "no") {
185  $model = $_SESSION ["model"];
186  $instance = new $model ();
187  $instance->_new = true;
188  $this->_edit ( $instance, $modal );
189  }
190 
191  public function update() {
192  $message = new CRUDMessage ( "Modifications were successfully saved", "Updating" );
193  $instance = @$_SESSION ["instance"];
194  $isNew = $instance->_new;
195  $updated = CRUDHelper::update ( $instance, $_POST );
196  if ($updated) {
197  $pk = OrmUtils::getFirstKeyValue ( $instance );
198  $message->setType ( "success" )->setIcon ( "check circle outline" );
199  if ($isNew) {
200  $this->jquery->get ( $this->_getFiles ()->getAdminBaseRoute () . $this->_getFiles ()->getRouteRefreshTable () . "/" . $pk, "#lv", [ "jqueryDone" => "replaceWith" ] );
201  } else {
202  if(DAO::$useTransformers){
203  TransformersManager::transformInstance($instance,'toView');
204  }
205  $this->jquery->setJsonToElement ( OrmUtils::objectAsJSON ( $instance ) );
206  }
207  } else {
208  $message->setMessage ( "An error has occurred. Can not save changes." )->setType ( "error" )->setIcon ( "warning circle" );
209  }
210  echo $this->_showSimpleMessage ( $message, "updateMsg" );
211  echo $this->jquery->compile ( $this->view );
212  }
213 
214  private function getModelInstance($ids,$transform=true) {
215  $model = $_SESSION ['model'];
216  $ids = \explode ( "_", $ids );
217  DAO::$useTransformers=$transform;
218  $instance = DAO::getOne ( $model, $ids, true );
219  if (isset ( $instance )) {
220  return $instance;
221  }
222  echo $this->showSimpleMessage ( "This object does not exist!", "warning", "Get object", "warning circle" );
223  echo $this->jquery->compile ( $this->view );
224  exit ( 1 );
225  }
226 
227  public function delete($ids) {
228  $instance = $this->getModelInstance ( $ids );
229  if (method_exists ( $instance, "__toString" ))
230  $instanceString = $instance . "";
231  else
232  $instanceString = get_class ( $instance );
233  if (sizeof ( $_POST ) > 0) {
234  if (DAO::remove ( $instance )) {
235  $message = $this->showSimpleMessage ( "Deletion of `<b>" . $instanceString . "</b>`", "info", "Deletion", "info", 4000 );
236  $this->jquery->exec ( "$('tr[data-ajax={$ids}]').remove();", true );
237  } else {
238  $message = $this->showSimpleMessage ( "Can not delete `" . $instanceString . "`", "warning", "Error", "warning" );
239  }
240  } else {
241  $message = $this->showConfMessage ( "Do you confirm the deletion of `<b>" . $instanceString . "</b>`?", "error", "Remove confirmation", "question circle", $this->_getFiles ()->getAdminBaseRoute () . "/delete/{$ids}", "#table-messages", $ids );
242  }
243  echo $message;
244  echo $this->jquery->compile ( $this->view );
245  }
246 
247  private function getFKMethods($model) {
248  $reflection = new \ReflectionClass ( $model );
249  $publicMethods = $reflection->getMethods ( \ReflectionMethod::IS_PUBLIC );
250  $result = [ ];
251  foreach ( $publicMethods as $method ) {
252  $methodName = $method->getName ();
253  if (JString::startswith ( $methodName, "get" )) {
254  $attributeName = lcfirst ( JString::replaceAtFirst ( $methodName, "get", "" ) );
255  if (! property_exists ( $model, $attributeName ))
256  $result [] = $methodName;
257  }
258  }
259  return $result;
260  }
261 
262  public function showDetail($ids) {
263  $instance = $this->getModelInstance ( $ids );
264  $viewer = $this->_getModelViewer ();
265  $hasElements = false;
266  $model = $_SESSION ['model'];
267  $fkInstances = CRUDHelper::getFKIntances ( $instance, $model, false );
268  $semantic = $this->jquery->semantic ();
269  $grid = $semantic->htmlGrid ( "detail" );
270  if (sizeof ( $fkInstances ) > 0) {
271  $wide = intval ( 16 / sizeof ( $fkInstances ) );
272  if ($wide < 4)
273  $wide = 4;
274  foreach ( $fkInstances as $member => $fkInstanceArray ) {
275  $element = $viewer->getFkMemberElementDetails ( $member, $fkInstanceArray ["objectFK"], $fkInstanceArray ["fkClass"], $fkInstanceArray ["fkTable"] );
276  if (isset ( $element )) {
277  $grid->addCol ( $wide )->setContent ( $element );
278  $hasElements = true;
279  }
280  }
281  if ($hasElements)
282  echo $grid;
283  $this->jquery->getOnClick ( ".showTable", $this->_getFiles ()->getAdminBaseRoute () . "/showModelClick", "#divTable", [ "attr" => "data-ajax","ajaxTransition" => "random" ] );
284  echo $this->jquery->compile ( $this->view );
285  }
286  }
287

289  return Startup::getConfig () ["mvcNS"] ["models"];

292  private function _getCks($array) {
293  $result = [ ];
294  foreach ( $array as $dataAjax => $caption ) {
295  $result [] = $this->_getCk ( $caption, $dataAjax );
296  }
297  return $result;
298  }
299 
300  private function _getCk($caption, $dataAjax) {
301  $ck = new HtmlCheckbox ( "ck-" . $dataAjax, $caption, "1" );
302  $ck->setProperty ( "name", "ck[]" );
303  $ck->setProperty ( "data-ajax", $dataAjax );
304  return $ck;
305  }

307  public function editMember($member) {
308  $ids = URequest::post ( "id" );
309  $td = URequest::post ( "td" );
310  $part = URequest::post ( "part" );
311  $instance = $this->getModelInstance ( $ids ,false);
312  $_SESSION ["instance"] = $instance;
313  $_SESSION ["model"] = get_class ( $instance );
314  $instance->_new = false;
315  $form = $this->_getModelViewer ()->getMemberForm ( "frm-member-" . $member, $instance, $member, $td, $part );
316  $form->setLibraryId ( "_compo_" );
317  $this->jquery->renderView ( "@framework/main/component.html" );
318  }
319 
320  public function updateMember($member, $callback = false) {
321  $instance = @$_SESSION ["instance"];
322  $model = $_SESSION ['model'];
323  $updated = CRUDHelper::update ( $instance, $_POST );
324  if ($updated) {
325  if ($callback === false) {
326  $dt = $this->_getModelViewer ()->getModelDataTable ( [ $instance ], $model, 1 );
327  $dt->compile ();
328  $value=$dt->getFieldValue ( $member );
329  if(DAO::$useTransformers){
330  $value=TransformersManager::applyTransformer($instance, $member, $value,'toView');
331  }
332  echo new HtmlContentOnly ($value );
333  } else {
334  if (method_exists ( $this, $callback )) {
335  $this->$callback ( $member, $instance );
336  } else {
337  throw new \Exception ( "The method `" . $callback . "` does not exists in " . get_class () );
338  }
339  }
340  } else {
341  UResponse::setResponseCode ( 404 );
342  }
343  }
